posts.post_content:
59 individual T206 - raw - poor/fair/good condition.

All prices include s/h (if order is over $50, I'll add delivery confirmation).

Check/mo/paypal (gift or regular, what you feel comfortable) is all fine.

Reply ONLY to:  [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url] (please NO personal messages, they confuse me).

Link to scans:  [url]http://s13.photobucket.com/albums/a296/mybuddyinc/hs710/?start=all[/url]


off to ebay:  [url]http://shop.ebay.com/sg713/m.html?_nkw=&_armrs=1&_from=&_ipg=&_trksid=p4340[/url]



Satisfaction guaranteed.

Thanks, Scott

[url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]
Two emails sent because I found another I'd like if still available!

42 are sold, 17 remain.

I work nights and didn't expect to have 40+ emails waiting for me this afternoon !!!!!:eek:

Sorry for any delay in responce, and sorry that some didn't get the card(s) they wanted.  Returned all emails in order of receipt.

As a reminder, if you send paypal as a gift, send another email with your address (I've found that paypal gift transactions don't always carry an address).


FUN -- FUN

Thanks, Scott
